elements.name: ChangedVetsText
elements.html: This section asks whether you changed primary veterinarians because of how {CmpnName}'s LP/GOLPP symptoms were handled and why you made that decision. This doesn't include specialists like surgeons or neurologists, only whether you moved {CmpnName}'s care from one primary veterinarian to another because of how {CmpnName}'s LP/GOLPP was handled.

elements.name: ChangedVetsDidChange
elements.title: Did you ever change primary veterinarians because how they handled {CmpnName}'s LP/GOLPP symptoms?

elements.name: ChangedVetsReason
elements.title: Why did you change veterinarians after {CmpnName} started showing symptoms of LP/GOLPP (please check all that apply)?

choices.text: The previous vet couldn't give possible causes for {CmpnName}'s symptoms.
The previous vet said {CmpnName}'s symptoms were just due to age.
The previous vet ordered tests that I didn't think were relevant to {CmpnName}'s symptoms.
I wasn't getting enough value from the previous vet's handling of {CmpnName}'s symptoms.

elements.name: ChangeVetsConfidence
elements.title: How confident were you in your previous primary vet's knowledge level about LP/GOLPP?
elements.description: 1 = no confident at all, 5 = very confident

elements.name: ChangedVetsAdvice
elements.title: What advice or recommendation did your previous primary vet's give you advice about dogname's LP/GOLPP symptoms?

choices.text: Gave no advice and said nothing can be done about {CmpnName}'s symptoms

elements.name: ChangedVetsSpecialistRecommendation
elements.title: What kind of specialist did your previous vet recommend or refer?

choices.text: Surgeon experienced in tieback or other LP surgery
